enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes
title: JOUR JOUR 480-0-21 Special Topics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This will be a reporting class, involving important and timely issues of security and civil liberties.? Using advanced public-affairs-reporting techniques and being focused on Chicago, students will specialize in specific issues and publish reports in multiple media.

subject: JOUR
